dict.string: Traceless needs access to control other applications for system cleanup operations.
Traceless needs administrator privileges to perform secure file deletion and system cleanup.
Traceless needs access to the Desktop folder to scan and clean files.
Traceless needs access to the Documents folder to scan and clean files.
Traceless needs access to the Downloads folder to scan and clean files.
Traceless needs access to removable volumes to perform secure deletion.
Traceless needs access to network volumes for cleanup operations.
Traceless needs local network access to detect network configuration and clean network traces.
Traceless requires system extension access for deep system cleanup.
